page.title: 14HOME FARM
page.content:
Home Farm is a dairy farm built in 1899 for the{Duke of Connaught.}They have a milking parlour and a place where they store the milk .
They have three bulls Vance,Texas and Glen.Home Farm have sheds for cows in the winter as well. They have many cows including the{Highland variety that are kept mainly for their meat. Altogether they have a hundred and twenty cows.
Before milking the cows the udders have to be cleaned just in case of disease.A cow can give up to forty five litres a day.The farm also has a filly named Blue and she is about to have a foal.Mr.Drennan and his son have rented the farm for 27 years.
